class.name: MessageFormatter
class.brief_description: A structure containing a message, to be formatted with according to its arguments.
class.description: Structure for dynamically generating messages from a pattern based on provided arguments. Bridge for [url=https://unicode-org.github.io/icu-docs/apidoc/released/icu4c/classicu_1_1message2_1_1MessageFormatter.html]ICU4C's MessageFormatter[/url]

method.name: format_to_string
method.description: Returns a formatted message in a UTF-8 encoded [PackedByteArray], according to [param arg_map]. Supports args of type [int], [float], and [String].
